typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fapcalcownreb as decimal(28,10),
		fapcalctax as decimal(28,10),
		fapcalcprem as decimal(28,10),
		fapcalcagcom as decimal(28,10),
		fapcalcadcom as decimal(28,10),
		fapcalcdisc as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select fapcalcownreb, fapcalctax, fapcalcprem, fapcalcagcom, fapcalcadcom, fapcalcdisc from dwh_stage.p_faptable where fapfapid=\'P 1805244    1\'',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 derive(coales = coalesce(fapcalctax + fapcalcprem + fapcalcownreb,0),
		coalesint = coalesce(fapcalctax + fapcalcprem + fapcalcownreb,0)*-1,
		int = (fapcalctax + fapcalcprem + fapcalcownreb)*-1,
		org = fapcalctax + fapcalcprem + fapcalcownreb,
		coalesintdec = coalesce(fapcalctax + fapcalcprem + fapcalcownreb,0)*toDecimal(-1, 28, 10)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select2 derive(each(match(true()), $$+'_usd' = $$/0.7596186999, $$+'_decim' = $$/0.759618699999999)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		coales,
		coalesint,
		int,
		org,
		coalesintdec
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
